name: Office
description: The player's base of operations, equipped with doors, lights, and security cameras.

name: Show Stage
description: The main stage where the animatronics start the night.

name: Backstage
description: The hallway behind the show stage, a common path for Bonnie and Chica.

name: Pirate Cove
description: Foxy's hiding spot. The player must monitor it carefully to prevent attacks.

name: Kitchen
description: An audio-only monitored location where Chica sometimes appears.

name: Dining Area
description: The main restaurant area where animatronics roam.

name: West Hall
description: The hallway on the left side leading to the office door.

name: East Hall
description: The hallway on the right side leading to the office door.

name: Supply Closet
description: Storage area within the building, rarely featured.

name: Restrooms
description: Customer restrooms in the building, sometimes referenced in lore.
